title: Edwardian Script with a different capital Z? - various suggestions {Seb, Rainer, Mike Y}
content:
Hi Typophiles

I am working on a packaging project with Edwardian Script ITC as the secondary typeface. The capital Z however is a bit tricky.

Do anyone know of a script that has a capital Z that would fit together with Edwardian Script but be more regular in it's shape? Right now I am trying on Snell Roundhand on for size but would like to hear from you. The Z has to stay above the baseline because I need to place a small text below. Worst case I need to draw the Z myself but it would be an easier process if I could substitute the letter and kern my way to a nice result.

I did a search and someone posted Ballantines, but the capital Z looks a bit like a capital L to me...  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ballantines+script+&site=d&start=26&num=25](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202105524/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ballantines+script+&site=d&start=26&num=25)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202105524im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Z_for_Zoo_5707.png)
author: jaksi

comments.content: Try also the Zâ€™s of Fling, Citadel Script or Diplomat.
Tried the Dorchester Script. The Z has the main weight on the vertical strokes + I find it a bit too detailed...
Citadel Script could be a nice alternative. It is a bit loopy in the top but the harmony with Edwardian is quite good. Thanx

How about [Pouty](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202105524/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/pouty/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D34%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DZ%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D24), or [Rastko](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202105524/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/rastko-itc/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D34%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DZ%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D22), or [Pirouette Separate One](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202105524/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pirouette-lt/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D34%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DZ%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D29)?

- Mike Yanega
